title: Madre-Silva
body: Common name for *Lonicera etrusca*, native to the Mediterranean region, and *L. confusa*, native to China and Japan, plants common in Madeira and belonging to the Caprifoliaceae family. The first of these plants is perfectly naturalized on the island; the second only appears in gardens. The *L. longiflora* is a madre-silva with large flowers, cultivated in some gardens in Funchal.

Funchal: Place where the *L. longiflora* is cultivated
